Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Tachystatin B2 (UCSS1a; 3S=S, chitin-binding, natural AMPs; Horseshoe Crab,  arachnids, Cheliceratas, arthropods, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; BBS)

Literature Information.Literature: You can rotate, zoom, and view the 3D structureherein the PDB. Tachystatins were found to bind chitin (fungi cell wall component), which may be related to antifungal activity. 8/8/2008 by GW.
Literature Information.Author: Osaki T, Omotezako M, Nagayama R, Hirata M, Iwanaga S, Kasahara J, Hattori J, Ito I, Sugiyama H, Kawabata S.1999
Literature Information.Title: Horseshoe crab hemocyte-derived antimicrobial polypeptides, tachystatins, with sequence similarity to spider neurotoxins.
